verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unreserved, unrestrained,
your love is wild
Your love is wild for me
It isn’t shy, its unashamed
Your love is proud
to be seen with me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You don’t give your heart in pieces,
You don’t hide yourself to tease us

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Uncontrolled, uncontained
You love is a fire
Burning bright for me
It’s not just a spark
It's not just a flame
Your love is a light
That all the world will see
That all the world will see

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You don’t give your heart in pieces
You don’t hide yourself to tease us
You don’t give your heart in pieces
You don’t hid yourself to tease us

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
You don’t give your heart in pieces, you don’t hid yourself to tease us
You don’t give your heart in pieces, you don’t hid yourself to tease us
You don’t give your heart in pieces, you don’t hid yourself to tease us
